00031     [Serializable()]
00032     public class Vector3
00033     {

00041         public Vector3(double X, double Y, double Z)
00042         {
00043             this.X = X;
00044             this.Y = Y;
00045             this.Z = Z;
00046         }
00047         #endregion
00048 
00049         #region Public Variables
00050 
00051 
00052 
00053         private double _X = 0.0;
00057         private double _Y = 0.0;
00061         private double _Z = 0.0;
00062         #endregion

00068         public void Normalize()
00069         {
00070             double Normal = Magnitude;
00071             if (Normal > 0)
00072             {
00073                 Normal = 1 / Normal;
00074                 X *= Normal;
00075                 Y *= Normal;
00076                 Z *= Normal;
00077             }
00078         }
00079         #endregion
00080 
00081         #region Public Overridden Functions
00082 
00083 
00084 
00085 
00086         public override string ToString()
00087         {
00088             return "(" + X + "," + Y + "," + Z + ")";
00089         }
00090 
00095         public override int GetHashCode()
00096         {
00097             return (int)(X + Y + Z) % Int32.MaxValue;
00098         }
00099 
00105         public override bool Equals(object obj)
00106         {
00107             if (obj is Vector3)
00108             {
00109                 return this == (Vector3)obj;
00110             }
00111             return false;
00112         }
00113         #endregion

00119         public double[] Array
00120         {
00121             get { return new double[] { X, Y, Z }; }
00122             set
00123             {
00124                 if (value.Length == 3)
00125                 {
00126                     X = value[0];
00127                     Y = value[1];
00128                     Z = value[2];
00129                 }
00130             }
00131         }
00132 
00136         public double Magnitude
00137         {
00138             get { return System.Math.Sqrt((X * X) + (Y * Y) + (Z * Z)); }
00139         }
00143         [XmlElement]
00144         public double X
00145         {
00146             get { return _X; }
00147             set { _X = value; }
00148         }
00152         [XmlElement]
00153         public double Y
00154         {
00155             get { return _Y; }
00156             set { _Y = value; }
00157         }
00158 
00162         [XmlElement]
00163         public double Z
00164         {
00165             get { return _Z; }
00166             set { _Z = value; }
00167         }

00172         {
00173             return new Vector3(V1.X + V2.X, V1.Y + V2.Y, V1.Z + V2.Z);
00174         }

00188             return V1.Magnitude < V2.Magnitude;

00193             return V1.Magnitude <= V2.Magnitude;

00206         public static bool operator ==(Vector3 V1, Vector3 V2)
00207         {
00208             return V1.X == V2.X && V1.Y == V2.Y && V1.Z == V2.Z;
00209         }
00210

00212         {
00213             return !(V1 == V2);
00214         }

00219         }

00221         public static Vector3 operator *(Vector3 V1, double D)
00222         {
00223             return new Vector3(V1.X * D, V1.Y * D, V1.Z * D);
00224         }
00225 
00226         public static Vector3 operator *(double D, Vector3 V1)
00227         {
00228             return new Vector3(V1.X * D, V1.Y * D, V1.Z * D);
00229         }
00233         public static Vector3 operator *(Vector3 V1, Vector3 V2)
00234         {
00235             Vector3 TempVector = new Vector3(0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
00236             TempVector.X = (V1.Y * V2.Z) - (V1.Z * V2.Y);
00237             TempVector.Y = (V1.Z * V2.X) - (V1.X * V2.Z);
00238             TempVector.Z = (V1.X * V2.Y) - (V1.Y * V2.X);
00239             return TempVector;
00240         }
00241 
00248         public static double DotProduct(Vector3 V1, Vector3 V2)
00249         {
00250             return (V1.X * V2.X) + (V1.Y * V2.Y) + (V1.Z * V2.Z);
00251         }
00252 
00260         public static Vector3 Interpolate(Vector3 V1, Vector3 V2, double Control)
00261         {
00262             Vector3 TempVector = new Vector3(0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
00263             TempVector.X = (V1.X * (1 - Control)) + (V2.X * Control);
00264             TempVector.Y = (V1.Y * (1 - Control)) + (V2.Y * Control);
00265             TempVector.Z = (V1.Z * (1 - Control)) - (V2.Z * Control);
00266             return TempVector;
00267         }
00268 
00275         public static double Distance(Vector3 V1, Vector3 V2)
00276         {
00277             return System.Math.Sqrt(((V1.X - V2.X) * (V1.X - V2.X)) + ((V1.Y - V2.Y) * (V1.Y - V2.Y)) + ((V1.Z - V2.Z) * (V1.Z - V2.Z)));
00278         }
00279 
00286         public static double Angle(Vector3 V1, Vector3 V2)
00287         {
00288             V1.Normalize();
00289             V2.Normalize();
00290             return System.Math.Acos(Vector3.DotProduct(V1, V2));
00291         }
00292         #endregion
00293     }
